en.name: Aqua Simulacra
en.passiveDescription: HP is increased by {{16//20//24//28//32%}}. When there are opponents nearby, the DMG dealt by the wielder of this weapon is increased by {{20//25//30//35//40%}}. This will take effect whether the character is on-field or not.

zh.name: 若水
zh.passiveDescription: 生命值提升{{16//20//24//28//32%}}。周围存在敌人时，装备该武器的角色造成的伤害都会提升{{20//25//30//35//40%}}，不论该角色处于场上或是处于队伍后台。
